text:
I registered a package 6 hours ago (automerged), and when I run the `Pkg.add` command, still the previous version is added. How can I fix this?
<https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General/issues/28687>

I was told that "It takes some time for it to propagate to the servers.". How long exactly does it take for the package to arrive to my place?

elements.text: I registered a package 6 hours ago (automerged), and when I run the
Pkg.add
command, still the previous version is added. How can I fix this?
I was told that "It takes some time for it to propagate to the servers.". How long exactly does it take for the package to arrive to my place?

text:
just double checking: have you run `] up` ?

(if you have a long running julia session it will only update the registry on first `] add` iirc, but always updates the registry on `] up`)

] up

?

] add
iirc, but always updates the registry on
] up

root.text:
I registered a package 6 hours ago (automerged), and when I run the `Pkg.add` command, still the previous version is added. How can I fix this?
<https://github.com/JuliaRegistries/General/issues/28687>

I was told that "It takes some time for it to propagate to the servers.". How long exactly does it take for the package to arrive to my place?

The package is finally here! I should have used UPS Express to speed up the delivery.
